lenders.name: Owen
lenders.loan_because: Imagine the possibilities....

lenders.loan_because: You gotta pay it forward and a little bit of kindness goes a long long way.
lenders.occupational_info: We complete background checks on potential employees & tenants.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference for someone who needs it and wants to better their life.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: Implementing microfinance programs in poverty-stricken countries is one of the most empowering ways to encourage community growth and development.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a representative of our beloved communities. My work with children and families encourages community development and unity through understanding, giving and accepting.

lenders.name: Kent Stephan Jensen
lenders.loan_because: Kiva.org is facilitating one of the best ways to help other people I can imagine.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a wonderful job as the Creative Director of Saatchi & Saatchi Copenhagen.

lenders.name: Adil
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea, never had the opportunity to participate in such a thing
lenders.occupational_info: Business consulting in Paris, helping companies improve their processes

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I like encouraging entrepreneurship, especially in regions that need the extra aid.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student.  Learning how to become an entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Jennifer Howse
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell homes to people.

lenders.name: Tess
lenders.loan_because: “We ourselves feel that what we are doing is just a drop in the ocean. But the ocean would be less because of that missing drop.” - Mother Teresa

lenders.name: Laila
lenders.loan_because: To see other people sucess with their lifegoals makes me very happy! As a nurse it is my way in life to help people that needs help! I hope all people thinks like me!
lenders.occupational_info: I think the word nurse speak for itself.

lenders.name: Célia & Daniel
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lenders.name: Brian & Susan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed. We've been blessed with many opportunities that have helped us in our careers. We choose to show our appreciation for our blessings by providing opportunity for others.
lenders.occupational_info: Brian and Susan met while working on the production of corporate marketing events. Brian is now at Microsoft working on corporate events for their executives. Susan has her own small business consulting firm.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to be successful in life, so these loans are made to help others provide all the needs for their families. These loans are in honor of my wonderful mother, BJ - Merry Christmas, Mom!
lenders.occupational_info: I am now retired and make glass beads at a torch in my basement studio. I make jewelry with the beads and sell it locally. I hope to get my website more interactive soon to sell my jewelry.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I want to support the people of Nicaragua.

lenders.name: Kriss
lenders.occupation: Executive Director - Center for Social Innovation

lenders.name: Christopher & Aleiva
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Simple as that.  If I can help, I should.
lenders.occupational_info: Designing and measuring the success of advertising.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: If you give a person a fish they eat for a day.  If you teach a man or woman to fish you feed them for  a lifetime.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people fix up their homes.

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: I believe strongly in helping people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people!  It gives me joy.
lenders.occupational_info: Stay at home mother of 2.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because:
I can be part of the solution in helping someone lift themselves and their families up out of poverty
by giving them an opportunity.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Al J.
lenders.loan_because: "I don't know what your destiny will be, but one thing I know: the only ones among you who will be really happy are those who will have sought and found how to serve"  Albert Schweitzer

lenders.name: Zoe
lenders.occupational_info: I perform whatever duties my bosses need: answering the phone, making purchases, buying lunch, keeping track of expenses and paying taxes.

lenders.name: EO Smith DECA
lenders.loan_because: DECA is an international organization that helps students improve their leadership skills, focus them toward careers and instill a civic and social understanding of our world.  That is why KIVA.org is such a great oppurtunity for our members to learn more about less fortunate entrepeneurs and gives us the oppurtunity to help them.
lenders.occupational_info: We are all high school students.  DECA is an after-school club that we participate in to learn more about business and the community.

lenders.name: Barbara, Maarten & Alex
lenders.loan_because: it's a way to tangibly help others to  help themselves.  I see concrete results of to whom and how the dollars we contribute go to empower others in a sustainable way--what could be better?

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: A lot of lifes good fortune can be attributed to where you were born. I have travelled extensively around the world and it never ceases to amaze me how engaging human beings can be, rich or poor. I am extremely impressed with the Kiva organization and intend to continue making loans whenever I can.
lenders.occupational_info: My work brings me into close contact with people in a very personal way. Buying a home remains the single largest purchase most people will ever make and it's very gratifying to assist people to make this experience come true

lenders.name: Sara Beth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women who I otherwise could not touch.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an attorney but i now run 4 trusts.  These trusts pay people who have asbestos illness related to companies in California, Minnesota and North Dakota, all states here in the U.S.A,.

lenders.name: GregRobin
lenders.loan_because: it does some good.  Money, without purpose, is wasted (see Benjamin Franklin  www.goBENgo.info &  www.ben-franklin.org).
lenders.occupational_info: I am a story teller.  I portray the character, thoughts and experiences of people like Benjamin Franklin so audiences can ask questions of that famous person. Called "Chautauqua" (sha TA kwa) it allows people to interact with history and understand better how important the past is to us today.

lenders.name: Pinnacle Performance Grp
lenders.loan_because: Our mission is to help people around the world work smarter. We believe that one of the ways that entrepreneurs can work smarter is to invest in their businesses. Our loans help these dedicated business people invest in what they need to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: Our  company creates training programs that teach employees how to do their jobs.

lenders.name: Wendi
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed and want to give other people (moms) a chance to provide a better life for their families.

lenders.name: robert
lenders.loan_because: why not
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers helping people to access the internet from their places of business.

lenders.name: Azadeh and Ethan
lenders.occupational_info: Azadeh is a Ph.D. candidate in social work, her research focuses on adolescent treatment engagement in community mental health. Ethan is a Ph.D. candidate in cell biology, his research focuses on cell motility and wound healing.

lenders.name: Stephen James
lenders.loan_because: This is one way to help others, and to do something for people that is truly meaningful, for the lives of people around the globe.  sjf
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired gentlemen, who is attempting to do something positive for other people, where ever they may reside in this world.

lenders.name: Veronica
lenders.loan_because: My uncle gave me the money to try it out.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm 7 years old.  I do math at school and help my mom with a lot of things.  I play the piano.  I like helping people.  I want to have glasses.  The glasses in the picture are just pretend.  My birthday is in August.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are trying to make a better life for themselves and their families

lenders.name: Yong-Nam
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to be able to help people!

lenders.name: Nicky
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed by circumstance and so many others have not.

lenders.loan_because: Every one of us will need help at some point in time.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctor taking care of women and delivering babies.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can and it's up to us all that can to give back in some way. I found this avenue most amazing and I always pull for the little guy or girl.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: I might be thosands of dollars in debt myself from school, but my life has been cushioned for a while and probably always will be.  I want to help and I'm so glad there's an organization out there excepting small donations and loans!

lenders.name: Lorenzo, Lori y Familia

lenders.occupational_info: Just trying to help where we can......

lenders.name: Chris Muschong

lenders.name: Jody
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the micro lending concept's ability to help where mainstream bank do not.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is like choosing good seeds and taking care of them for a few years until they grow strong enough to survive on their own. It takes a lot of patience because it's a marathon, not a sprint.

lenders.name: Sarbjit
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help others around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Genentech which is part of the Roche organisation .

lenders.name: lynne
lenders.loan_because: Because, the King will answer them, ‘Truly, I say to you, as you did it to one of the least of these my brothers, you did it to me.’
lenders.occupational_info: I help the people who help people.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: These hardworking people deserve a chance....for a better life, for opportunities for their children.  As a parent, I strive to set an example for my children.  I wish for them the gift of knowing how rewarding it is to help those less fortunate.  I want them to know that they CAN make a difference...and we are.
lenders.occupational_info: I work part-time as a finance/accounting consultant.

lenders.name: Audrey& John
lenders.loan_because: I was given a Gift Cert . as a Christmas present ,by my daughter ,and I was delighted to be helping someone get started in business.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: McKee
lenders.loan_because: The children are learning it really is better to give than to receive.
lenders.occupational_info: This group of children were given this donation in lieu of Xmas gifts at our annual Christmas party to help another family.

lenders.name: Ken Chan
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in sustainable capacity building, and that the best gift of humanity one can offer to another thousands of miles away is hope and opportunity. 

I travelled to Ecuador in June '07 as part of a World Council of Credit Unions delegation, and saw first hand how micro credit has improved the lives of local entrepreneurs. The photo you see here is that of Margarita. I visited her farm outside the town of Nabon. With the help of micro loans from Cooperativa de Ahorro y Credito Jardin Azuayo, Margarita and her husband Geranomo were able to build a small chicken and guinea pig farm. She is now able to send her two older children to college and her younger daughter (pictured here) to primary school.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in various levels of government in Canada and the United Kingdom. Today, I'm the Vice President, Advocacy, Research and Healthcare at Cystic Fibrosis Canada.

lenders.name: Tim / Kelsey
lenders.loan_because: i know that it is the right thing to do and that only 25 dollars can change someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: we loan because we want to.

lenders.name: Curt
lenders.loan_because: Social justice...helping out your neighbor...we are all neighbors.

lenders.name: Intrust IT
lenders.loan_because: We value empathy and happiness.  We empathize with people all over the world trying to improve their situation, and we want them to achieve their dreams and be happy.
lenders.occupational_info: We provide IT services to small and medium sized companies.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: Because people need a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with cancer manage their illness

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the concept of "Pay it Forward"
lenders.occupational_info: Helping to run and fund a teaching hospital

lenders.occupational_info: Challenging, exciting, meaningful, ever changing, and full of love.

lenders.occupational_info: put your cell phone down and pay attension damnit!

give someone a chance for better
life

I also know that women make the best decisions in terms of spreading the wealth and improving a larger group. I am fortunate that I am able to help others. My small contribution through this wonderful organization goes a long way and can make a huge difference to deserving entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked with computers as an engineer then in marketing, sales and management. My strength is in managing projects. I will soon begin a company and I pray that the support I wish for all others is sent my way,

lenders.occupational_info: I am in financial services and my wife is a teacher

lenders.name: Lindsley
lenders.loan_because: It pleases me to be able to directly help people, I learn about experiences, the business owners are inspiring, it connects me to other sponsoring partners and to beneficiaries of the loan, and KIVA is a marvelous program of giving.  I'm glad I learned about KIVA through President Clinton's book.

Psaume 112:5 - Heureux l'homme qui exerce la miséricorde et qui prête. Qui règle ses actions d'après la justice.

lenders.loan_because: This is the right thing to do!

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: This is a way for relatively affluent people to ensure that their contributions to less financially fortunate people have maximum effect.

lenders.loan_because: It gives hope to people

lenders.name: Kim

lenders.occupational_info: My spouse and I have a cost managment consulting business that is 17 years old.  It is great to be your own boss!

lenders.loan_because: I have the capability

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and others have so little.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: Life has been good to me. A small contribution may enable people not only to help themselves but also their community. If these people can find a way to grow their businesses, employ more people at a higher than average wage, improve the standard of their living conditions and also the conditions of those around them, well, that sounds pretty good to me.
lenders.occupational_info: Jack of all trades, master of none.

lenders.occupational_info:
The Baugher Sisters:

me (Barbra):  I go to school where I am learning about government and nonprofits organizations - I want to make the world a better place for everyone.  I am married and I have one son named Cameron. 

Becca: Becca works at an elementary school taking care of children with special needs.  She is married and has four daughters - Madison, Leighia, Karynne, and Juliana.  Becca is kind, thoughtful,  and takes care of everyone - she is a great mom!

Beth:  Beth works in human resources at a university.  She is married and just recently had a baby girl, Gabrielle Alese.  Beth is really good at making people laugh and offers great advice.

Bonita:  Bonita is in the Air Force.  She is currently stationed in Tucson, Arizona.  She recently returned from being stationed in the Middle East, and is happy to be back with her husband and their son, Landon.  She is also a photographer.  Bonita is extremely smart and creative.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I want to share in blessing others, especially women,  as they care for those they love.  There are times we each need a hand extended, not a hand out ,which is why I believe in Kiva's mission!

lenders.name: charlie
lenders.occupational_info:
We can handle income tax matters for individuals, couples, families and small business owners or professionals.

The objective of every tax return preparation and income tax planning engagement is to ensure you pay the lowest possible tax allowed by the tax rules this year and in future years, so your assets can grow. With 24 Hour Tax & Accounting you will know your reporting is correct and on time.

Your tax liability will be as low as legally possible. You can be assured that 24 Hour Tax & Accounting monitors the latest tax rulings that might affect your return. Come by, call or email us today for information regarding our services and options and one of our staff will get back to you.
 
 
 
 
 Taxes & Consulting 
Competitive Rates

lenders.loan_because:
FUNDING FOR USA SMALL BUSINESS ASSISTANT EFFORT Purpose and Activities

lenders.occupational_info:
FUNDING FOR USA SMALL BUSINESS ASSISTANT EFFORT
To acknowledge the fundamental need for a regional national empowerment  of the arts; performing art theatrical company writers/actors workshop cultural plan  to establish a commission to examine the effect of research and development findings and determination there of., subsequently de jure and de facto economic development of low country Americans, and the impact of these forces on low country Americans, to make recommendations  NEA on appropriate remedies, and for other purposes. 

A working group of local representatives will develop a regional cultural plan.  Work with a cultural advisory committee to assess resources and develop a cultural plan .  Funds to implement programs to support a community cultural plan, 
INTRODUCTION OF THE ORGANIZATION 

Please contact any of these organizations direct to obtain a description of them and their involvement. these local groups will be empowered with the education , support and advocacy to ensure that there is fair treatment for all people with regard to the development, implementation, and enforcement of environmental policies.

Theses local community groups are committed to actively recruit members from the communities which they are apart of , and to response community forums/ discussion groups dealing specifically with performing art and the big budget motion picture industry, these  community forums / discussion group will focus on education and involvement in the ACS/AH

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: Unfortunately and with regret, I too will be withdrawing my funds from KIVA as they are repaid.  KIVA lenders have repeatedly asked the KIVA administration to remove loans that involve cockfighting, but they refuse to do so.  I understand that there are cultural differences, but animal cruelty is animal cruelty.  I have been a KIVA member for three years, spoke VERY highly of KIVA and have recruited other people as well, so it is with a heavy heart that I will no longer be supporting KIVA.

lenders.name: jackie
lenders.loan_because: my mother and i started our business with the support and help from our friends. we truly started with very little, and now run a very successful business. I want to give someone the same help and support.  Hard work really does pay off...

lenders.name: neuber.com
lenders.loan_because:
We loan because lots of people have helped up build one of the largest databases of Windows processes, files, spyware and rootkits on http://www.neuber.com and http://www.file.net.
◌◌◌◌◌
We want to pass their help on to people who really need it. 
◌◌◌◌◌
We are donating $1 for each new user comment left at http://www.neuber.com/taskmanager/process or http://www.file.net, because as each user comment helps us build a more valuable website, we in turn want to extend our help to hard-working people around the world so that their dreams may come true. 
◌◌◌◌◌
We loan without expecting a payback. A payback is a bonus, and will go to help another family.
◌◌◌◌◌
Up until now, we have helped 531 groups and individuals with more than $13,000.

lenders.loan_because: I loan in order to help  the poor and as well impart positively in the lives of people for a better tomorrow.
lenders.occupational_info: Am simple,kind,caring,humble,and decent human being that devote and dedicated to my assigned duties.I want every one to help to change the world to be a better place for all of us to live,I am the Initiator/Coordinator - National Youth Empowerment Initiative-founded in 1998,President-Amigo Youth Forum Okoko Item - A Community Youth Organization - Founded in 2003,Member-Taking It Global Organization and Abia State Coordinator -The Love Foundation Nigeria Inc.U.S.A a non profit,non governmental organization that encourage all youths academically,connect them socially,support them financially,strengthened them with working opportunities,support them with strong moral character and educate youths on the danger of H.I.V/AIDS virus and other diseases,train and support those that lack sufficient learning/working opportunities, Initiate,Support and embark on any useful projects that will benefit our Communities and Globally, Patron-Abia 1, Aba District and 2nd Aba Company of Boys/Girls Brigade Nigeria of Christ Methodist Church Nigeria -21/25 Market Road,Aba, Abia-State in 1998 and presently The Local Lead Agency for Global Youth Action Network U.S.A on Global Youth Service Day 2005 and 2007(GYSD)

lenders.occupation: field hockey coach and restaurant server

lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who help themselves. I think that most people prefer a "helping hand" to a "hand out" and want to make their own way in society.
lenders.occupational_info: I review building permits for houses, fences, swimming pools, and other structures people want to build on their property.

lenders.name: Jo Ann
lenders.loan_because: I belive in the golden rule, "Do unto others as you would have them do unto you."  To be a part of giving someone hope is a true blessing to me.

lenders.name: Yes We Can
lenders.loan_because: I can... and I should.

lenders.name: Alison & Chris
lenders.loan_because: we like to see people succeed in their own businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: Alison creates web sites for people and businesses, and Chris designs software that is used in the health care industry around the world.

lenders.name: Jay & Amy
lenders.loan_because: we are so excited to be part of what God is doing in people's lives - to help them achieve their dreams and make their families more prosperous.

lenders.name: Angie & Shannon
lenders.loan_because: poverty allows bad people to commit corruption and abuse  against the poor who are so busy trying to physically save their lives each day through the aquisition of food and shelter that they have no time to devote to creating the political and cultural changes neccessary to end their oppression by those who benefit greatly from abusing others, especially women and children.  Creating jobs is one of the most important things we can do for people everywhere.  Any of us familiar with US History know that job creation is vital to our freedom from oppression because rather than just struggling to survive each day  we  have time to monitor our  government through participation in the political proccess .  Without jobs we would be an oppressed third world nation subject to the abuse of the many who  are cruel enough to  oppress for their own profits and pleasures in life.  Jobs give us a voice and the opportunity to express it through our making of laws for our benefit as a society in whole rather than for the benefit of the 10 percent  of our population that would choose their selfish pleasures at the exzpense of anyone. Whether those are corrupt corporate leaders (most of whom are decent people), child molestors, corupt government officials, people who drink and drive and kill a person every 29 minutes in our country or whomever wants to be destructive for their own pleasure,  Our ability to have good paying jobs allows us a voice against their evil  and we hope that for you as well.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I are well paid laborers, cleaning homes and doing construction work. We participate in politics both local and national.  We love the outdoors.  Neither of us has any past or current addictions to substances that interfer with our achieving a high quality of life.  We love lots of outdoor activites and we love helping people. We live modestly so we can help others.  We also sponser a family in Africa.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: A fantastic way to help people make a difference in their lives.  A small investment by many can jump start an individual's business.

lenders.loan_because: I try and be the example to my students in giving back makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I love teaching, making kids think.

lenders.occupational_info: I buy and/or create businesses, build them up and sell them eventually or take in a working partner who has a vested interest.

lenders.occupational_info: I manage programs for clients. I consult with clients to define what they want from my company, then I lead my company's teams to deliver it (e.g. customized software, marketing program, website, etc.)

lenders.loan_because: I want to give others great opportunities that they may not have had otherwise in life. I am only 24 and don't have a lot to give but just knowing you are helping even a little means a lot.
lenders.occupational_info: I help support and protect large networks of computers that businesses have. Their security is very important because if they lose all of their private data or they lose their customers information, they lose the foundation of their business.
